name: Shifter (RGB Games)
description:
Game Overview

Shifter is a Puzzle-Platformer presented by RGB Games. The player’s goal as the Shifter is that they must maneuver each level to find the Exit Portal by shifting between two realities to overcome obstacles, lock doors and traps.

The player is encouraged to use their intuition and creativity to solve their way through each level with multiple solutions. Shifting between the realities will present them with differently placed obstacles.

Within a long lost castle, the player must travel to the very top to achieve victory. Adventure, Parkour and Puzzle-Solving await! Will you be able to navigate your way to victory? Or be stuck within the castle walls?

Credits Software Engineers
  • Gervince Go
  • William de Beer
Game Artists
  • Roger Painting
  • Sabrina Li
  • William Lawrence
